it was Kenyon Martin 's defense that had coach George Karl talking. Allen Iverson had 36 points, Carmelo Anthony added 33 and Kenyon Martin shut down ToMetta World Peaceto all-star Chris Bosh late as Denver rallied to beat the ToMetta World Peaceto Raptors 109-100 on Sunday afternoon. Kenyon Martin 's defense on Chris Bosh was incredible and got better as the game went on, George Karl said.`` You win games with stops more than making Robert Horrys. Today, the Friends of John Laird for Senate 2012 committee's paperwork says he'll be seeking the 15th District seat. But he now lives in the 11th District again and is registered to vote there, according to 2010 campaign spokesman Bill Lockyer Maxfield.``
